name: Prize Corporation
overview: Prize Corporation provides Web-based automotive CRM solutions. It offers Express CRM, a suite of CRM modules that includes Express ILM (Internet Lead Management), a Web-enables solution for the manufacturer’s ILM requirements; Express Sales, a Web-enables solution for lead, sales, and business development center management; and Express Service, a Web-enables solution for Service CRM. The company also provides Enterprise CRM, a customer-centric Software-as-a-Service CRM solution; and Phone tracking software that integrates with ReckonUp CRM. In addition, it offers professional services, such as planning and implementing a CRM solution; education services, such as discussion forums and online training; and support services, which include an online support center, online support request form, telephone support, and an online learning center. The company is based in Chattanooga, Tennessee. As of August 1, 2007, Prize Corporation is a subsidiary of Logix Microsystems, Ltd.
